Articles.Content: So I recently got the Oculus Rift DK2 and I can't figure out how to get any games like DayZ Standalone to work with it. I know that you need programs like OpenTrackIR and Tridef 3D but I can't seem to figure out how to use those and get it to work. My rift works fine in the demos but doesn't at all in the games. I know that DayZ Standalone doesn't support the DK2 but I've seen some videos of people using it with those programs. Any of you guys know how to get the rift to work with other games like DayZ?
